A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Good grief. What did I just watch? Let me start off by saying Im a huge star wars fan for 34 years. My 1st born son (now 6 years old) is named Luke\, after my hero. My fondest memory is when my father took me to see Return of the Jedi when I was 9 years old. I watched every movie hundreds of times. I got my children into star wars. Their favorites are empire and return of jedi. I loved force awakens. I loved rogue one\, especially the last 2 minutes. The Last Jedi doesnt even seem like a star wars movie. I don't know what the heck I just watched. Hologram Luke. Superman Leia. Dumb jokes every 5 minutes. It was awful. It kills me too say this because I'm such a huge fan.
